content: Howdy! My name is Jordan McDonald and I’m a junior Business major from Midland, Texas, but more importantly I’m the loudest and proudest member of the Fightin’ Texas Aggie Class of 2022 (A-A-A WHOOP)! My three favorite things are playing guitar, Zaxby’s, and my dog. I’m so excited to meet the Class of 2024 and get the year started! WHOOP!
name: Jordan McDonald
